    SupportKit Entry Point

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init(android.app.Application application,
                        java.lang.String appToken)
        Convenient method to initialize the SupportKit SDK using the default settings.

        See SupportKit.init(Context, Settings)

        Parameters:
        application - The Application
        appToken - The app token

      • init

        public static void init(android.app.Application application,
                        Settings settings)
        Initialize the SupportKit SDK with the provided settings.

        This may only be called once (preferably, in Application.onCreate()).

        Use SupportKit.getSettings() to retrieve and modify the given settings object.

        Parameters:
        application - The Application
        settings - The settings to use

      • destroy

        public static void destroy()
        Terminate the SupportKit facilities.

        SupportKit is automatically terminated when the application exits. This method does not, usually, have to be called manually.

      • getSettings

        public static Settings getSettings()
        Accessor method for the SDK settings.

        Use this object to update settings at run time. Note: Some settings may only be configured at init time. See the Settings class reference for more information.

        Returns:
        Settings object passed in init(Application, Settings), or null if SupportKit hasn't been initialized yet.

      • getConversation

        public static Conversation getConversation()
        Accessor method for the current conversation.
        Returns:
        Current conversation, or null if SupportKit.init() hasn't been called yet.

      • getInitializationStatus

        public static InitializationStatus getInitializationStatus()
        Accessor method for the current AppBoot status.
        Returns:
        AppBoot status, or null if SupportKit.init() hasn't been called yet.

      • getGoogleCloudMessagingProjectId

        public static java.lang.String getGoogleCloudMessagingProjectId()
        Accessor method to get the Google Cloud Messaging project id that was linked to the application via the Web portal.
        Returns:
        The Google Cloud Messaging project Id

      • setGoogleCloudMessagingToken

        public static void setGoogleCloudMessagingToken(java.lang.String token)
        Method used to register the Google Cloud Messaging token to SupportKit
        Parameters:
        token - The Google Cloud Messaging token

      • track

        public static void track(java.lang.String eventName)
        Tracks an app event, and processes any whispers associated with that event.

        Whispers can be configured in the SupportKit admin panel. Whispers can only be fulfilled once per app user, and tracking an event after the whisper has been fulfilled will have no effect.

        Parameters:
        eventName - The name of the event to track. This should match a whisper created on the admin panel for your app.
